title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 587.7 - Validity of regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 587.7 - Validity of regulations

State Regulations

If any section, subdivision, paragraph or subparagraph of
the rules and regulations shall be adjudged invalid, such adjudication shall
apply only to the section, subdivision, paragraph and subparagraph so adjudged, and the rest of these rules and regulations shall be and remain valid and
effective. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
587.7

Adopted

New

York State Register July 15, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 28, eff. 7/15/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
